custom.steps: Create an enabled Profile with only a Base Visit history rule. Ie: json body : { "name": "VH Basic Rule Only", "description": "a basic rule only, no attrib", "enabled": true, "visitRule" : { "tagName" : "texas" <----- this needs to match an EXISTING Location Tag in the DB } }
custom.expected: Verify 200 ok response contains date_created, and rest of the objects from the original POST request
